name: paired_t_test
description: Perform a paired t-test on two numeric columns within the same dataset.

file_path.description: Path to the data file (.csv, .xlsx, .json, or .jsonl).

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (only for Excel files).

x_col.description: The name of the first numeric column to compare.

y_col.description: The name of the second numeric column to compare.
